name: DeleteAsanaProject
description:
Delete a specific project in Asana.

Use this tool to delete an existing project in Asana by providing the project's unique identifier. The tool is called when you need to remove a project from Asana, and it confirms the deletion without returning any additional data.

parameters.name: project_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project to be deleted in Asana.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable pretty formatting for the response to make it more readable. It's recommended for debugging purposes only due to increased response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.
